document_data.name: Flounder
document_data.mainbody: '''Flounder''' was the name given to several species of flatfish,
document_data.Habitats: A species of flounder known as [[Witch (fish)|witch]] was found inhabiting the [[Sea of Moving Ice]]. There, it was believed that these fish were bled for some dark rituals by [[hag]] covens, however those old fishwife tales had little truth to them.
document_data.Usages:
Flounder was a common type of fish to be fried for consumption. The cheap [[Waterdhavian]] dish called [[melverfew]] was made using diced [[eel]]s, [[mushroom]]s, [[catfish]], and founder, slowly cooked until tender in [[oxen]]-and-[[onion]] [[gravy]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}

The [[Golden Goblet Inn]] in the town of [[Mossbridges]] served [[baked flounder]] dish for the price of a single [[gold]] [[coin]],{{Cite organized play/LC/The Good, the Undead, and the Ugly|21}} and [[Ravens Bluff]]s restaurant called [[Embrol Sludge's Eatery & Shell Shoppe]] sold dishes made with fresh flounder paired with fine [[elven]] [[wine]].{{Cite organized play/LC/Dawning of a New Day|29}}
